name: GMail 80 Character Marker & Monospace Messages
description:
For people who like writing plain-text mails:

  • use monospace fonts for editor window & mail display
  • add a grey line & grey background in editor windows to signify the 80 character mark

Before you use this style, you may want to install the Droid Sans Mono font (or, you could set a font that's more to your liking).
